Reviews.Title: Nice accessory for the Alpha 200 only
Reviews.Author: Hiram Grant "just call me Sam"
Reviews.Content: This LCD protector would be hard to improve upon, and keep inexpensive.  It attaches easily, but securely, to notches located in the Alpha 200 body.  If this protector is damaged, it can easily be replaced.The only slight drawback, as to be expected, is another layer that adds reflections.  There are some multicoated, glass, third party screens that would work (they reduce the glare more), but cost double, and are a bit more difficult to remove (say, to get to a speck of dirt that has somehow gotten under it).For those with an Alpha 350, no, this protector does not work.Perfect?  No.  But it works well and is inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: M. George
Reviews.Content: One of the things I worried about most with my new Sony Alpa 200 was keeping the LCD screen looking good.  As with any digital camera the screen is very easy to scratch (or worse) and although you do not use the screen to take pictues with this model, I want to keep it as nice as possible.I was thinking about getting one of those film protectors when I saw this one and ordered it.  I like it....it pops into place and fits perfectly, which it should since Sony made it for this camera, and is not obtrusive at all;  it does stick out just a little bit but does not get in the way, at least for me.Overall, I think that it is well worth 12 bucks to have the screen protected and if it gets scratched I can just pitch it and get another one, unlike the LCD screen on the camera!

Reviews.Title: I like the added safety
Reviews.Author: Dr.Z
Reviews.Content: This item has been on my camera for several years. It fits perfect, is easy to see through, and does not impede any function of the camera. Honestly, you can't go wrong with this cover, especially for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great investment for the a200
Reviews.Author: M. Kirk "Bass Man"
Reviews.Content: There is no protection for the LCD screen on the a200 out of the box and this is vulnerable component of the camera. I like it because it is permanent, not a disposable film cover and it is solid plastic so it will hold up pretty well. A great, inexpensive cover to protect your investment.

Reviews.Title: Handy little thing
Reviews.Author: Kathy Hawken
Reviews.Content: Thought maybe it would be cheap and not worth the small amount I paid.  I was pleasantly surprised into finding it well made and really works well. No problem seeing LCD on my Sony a200.  Thanks Amazon...great buy.

Reviews.Title: Buy it with the camera....
Reviews.Author: B. W. Goff "An open mind"
Reviews.Content: Within a week of buying my Sony A200 DSLR camera.... I had a small scratch on the LCD. Then I bought the Sony PCK-LH2AM. It came in the mail, I opened it up, read the instructions, simply attached it on and there it stays.  If it gets scratched or damaged I'll buy another one. Well worth the money.I too wish Sony would include it with the camera, how about a recommended suggestion even.  Not that the LCD is fragile or anything, it's going to get banged around with use. They don't make body armor for the A200 yet but if they do I will probably get that too.

Reviews.Title: Expensive plastic but...a must
Reviews.Author: Gary M.
Reviews.Content: These seem expensive for a piece of molded plastic but are a must to protect your camera's LCD.  Definitely helps it hold the resale value.  They pop on and off so you don't need put anything sticky on your LCD which is good.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD Protector
Reviews.Author: F. J. Morazan
Reviews.Content: I bought this LCD protector to my camera Sony Alpha 200, it's fits great. It helps to protect againts scratches.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Joe Gallegos
Reviews.Content: A little pricey for a piece of plastic, but it does what its intended to do.  Snaps into place really easy and doesn't look awkward. Although dust or dirt can get under the plastic which may scratch the LCD so if you are really worried about that, stick to the adhesive films which do the same job and are cheaper

Reviews.Title: Works but unbelievably expensive
Reviews.Author: Jagadeesh K. Venugopal
Reviews.Content: This has got to be the product with the greatest profit margin to Sony. It is nothing but a rectangular piece of clear plastic with two notches that fit the Sony Alpha 200.You definitely need this, especially if you wear the camera strap around your neck. Without this, the LCD screen will rub against buttons/zippers, and will soon scratch. The actual product is great -- I mean how difficult can it be to make a rectangular piece of plastic?I think Sony should have included this with the camera at no additional cost. It probably cost them a dime to make, and they sell it for more than 100 times the cost.The frugal minded can try a different approach: if you already have PDA screen protectors, cut one to fit the LCD screen and save yourself the extra expense.

Reviews.Title: Custom fit your screen, but too costly
Reviews.Author: P. Lau
Reviews.Content: Will protect your screen from scratches. However they are richly priced. Over $10 for a piece of plastic. Their margin must be over 99%!

Reviews.Title: LCD Screen Protector
Reviews.Author: Udderguy
Reviews.Content: A very valuable asset to the camera. Offers good protection. Easy to install! Highly recommend to anyone with an "unprotected" LCD.

Reviews.Title: A true rip off
Reviews.Author: Dennis Atwell
Reviews.Content: It's a piece of plastic worth $0.99 and it costs $12. Go figure, it does protect the plastic that protects your LCD but it is a rip off at this price. Here's hoping another manufacturer makes a clone...
